name: The Cigna Group
summary: The Cigna Group is a global health services company offering medical, dental, pharmacy, and supplemental insurance as well as health management services to individuals, employers, and government organizations. Headquartered in Bloomfield, Connecticut, Cigna ranks among the top U.S. health insurers and serves over 100 million customers worldwide through its Evernorth, U.S. Medical, and International Markets segments.
